description: Index of 6^n in A025622, numbers of form 5^i*6^j.
links: W. Kuszmaul, Fast Algorithms for Finding Pattern Avoiders and Counting Pattern Occurrences in Permutations, arXiv preprint arXiv:1509.08216, 2015
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {v = []; for (n=0, nn, for (m = 0, nn, v = vecsort(concat(v, 5^n*6^m),,8););); n=0; for (k=1, #v, vk = v[k]; if ((valuation(vk, 6)==n) && (valuation(vk, 5) == 0), if (vk > 5^(nn+1), return(), print1(k, ", "); n++);););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 28 2015
author: _David W. Wilson_
extensions: Offset set to 0 by _Michel Marcus_, Sep 27 2015
